title: 44: Bachelor Tea! (Q & A Edition)
itunes:title: 44: Bachelor Tea! (Q & A Edition)
description:
It’s time to spill a little Bachelor/ette tea with The Broads! They chat behind the scenes secrets, sliding into contestants DMs,old folk’s version of the show, contestant hook ups, Bekah shares her current feelings about Arie, and much more!
Chatty Broads is recorded and produced @theblueroommedia www.theblueroommedia.com (http://www.theblueroommedia.com/)
